subject: clutch pedal not working
description_text:
Good Morning,

i recently purchased simson pro x pedals and the clutch pedal is not working out of the box, the pedals are all plugged in correctly, my software is fully up to date, and when i plug the throttle pedal into the clutch pedal port it functions correctly so there is no issue with the control box, please assist.

Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Luke Cozier,    If you plug the clutch into the throttle port and the clutch still shows no signal on the throttle channel, please try the steps below first:    Plug all three pedals back into the correct ports;    Unplug and replug the USB once;    Open SIMSONN Manager and click Offset, then follow the steps in the pop-up (this shifts the white/raw signal to the 0% position);    Recalibrate the pedals and press each pedal in sequence to complete calibration. After successful calibration, the blue signal should move smoothly from 0% to 100%.    If the clutch still doesn’t work after these steps, it may be that the clutch pressure sensor or the RJ11 connector/cable was damaged during shipping. Please provide your order number and the recipient name, phone number, and shipping address. We will send you a replacement clutch sensor spare part for you to swap in. Thank you for your effort and cooperation!
